body: Great piece of work. I was going to say I'd like to be trained like that until I saw the mouse thing. No thanks.

The fat-ass torturer was a big turn off for me, and the plot was pretty predictable.  A little too dark for me. I did like alot of the themes though. I should check out more yaoi stuff.  I noticed that the e <dash> hentai  website has alot good content than even here and also supports torrents.  Its kinda slow though... sometimes its worth it.
this is fucking amazing but the mice eating part kills my boner everytime
